mapper.insert: INSERT INTO playlist_songs (playlist_id, song_id, created_at) VALUES (#{playlistId}, #{songId}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT song_id FROM playlist_songs WHERE playlist_id = #{playlistId} ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT * FROM playlist_songs WHERE playlist_id = #{playlistId} AND song_id = #{songId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM playlist_songs WHERE playlist_id = #{playlistId} AND song_id = #{songId}
